thread.title: BRIEF-C&J Energy Services Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.31

title: BRIEF-C&J Energy Services Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.31
text:
May 3, 2018 / 1:22 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago BRIEF-C&J Energy Services Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.31 Reuters Staff
May 3 (Reuters) - C&J Energy Services Inc: * C&J ENERGY SERVICES ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE $553 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $544.6 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* “WE ANTICIPATE GROWTH IN OUR OTHER CORE BUSINESS LINES WILL CONTINUE.”
* EFFECTIVE MAY 1, 2018, SUCCESSFULLY UPSIZED CREDIT FACILITY PROVIDING FOR UP TO $400.0 MILLION OF BORROWING CAPACITY
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.41 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
